title: Maybe its time to go back to forums
body:
While i don't mind the boards at all and their visuals are probably better, we just don't have the numbers in this server for boards to be effective, in NA each post gets hundreds of views and comments and likes/dislikes and if its a good thread the likes outweigh the dislikes and it hangs around, its a self regulating system. but in oce not only is it just dead, with so few new discussions, but all it takes is for one person to dislike a post and it instantly drops down below the front page and because few people bother loading beyond the front page (because the ones below are the ones that have been on the front page for weeks because its so dead) people never get a chance to see it and have the chance to like it to bring it back up.

there boards are in their beta stage and it hasn't performed as expected, if we miss out on dominion and ranked 3's because of numbers, it only stands to reason that we miss the boards too.

replies.body:
You should be sorting by recent, not by best, hot, or new. that means that the threads that have the newest posts in them are at the top, and the ones that are dead aren't.

and we're not going to get forums back. it doesn't matter how valid your points are or how convincing your argument is, riot's decided that we're using boards now and that's final.
